biotools.summary: A Statistical Online Model Checker for Biological Pathway Models, based on the PLTLs formalism for expressing the rules/properties to be checked. It can currently check pathways models written either in CSML or SBML.

bioschemas.name: MIRACH
bioschemas.summary: A Statistical Online Model Checker for Biological Pathway Models, based on the PLTLs formalism for expressing the rules/properties to be checked. It can currently check pathways models written either in CSML or SBML.
